uDUS Documetation
delete user php

This module contains routines to delete an existing user from the Data Base. You can easily delete a Doctor or a Nurse from the DB from Admin position.

Contents

  • Delete user
  • Display user
  • Get data from DB
  • Settings

Delete user

Query to delete user's data from the DataBase, whose login is transfered by variable "login"

Display user

Display user's data (without password) -> login, permission, data of starting job, name and surname in the admin's page

Get data from DB

Query to find and get all data from table, which name is stored in variable "tableName"

Settings

Set default data
